original_title: Deep Purple: Concerto for Group and Orchestra
overview: 1. Intro 2. First Movement: Moderato - Allegro 3. Second Movement: Andante 4. Third Movement: Vivace - Presto  Recorded on September 24th, 1969 at London's Royal Albert Hall, Jon Lord's Concerto for Group and Orchestra really was a meeting of two different worlds.
title: Deep Purple: Concerto for Group and Orchestra
